# idsec_sia_secrets_vm (Data Source)

SIA Secrets VM data source, reads VM secrets information and metadata, based on the id of the secret.

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "idsec_sia_secrets_vm" "example_secret" {
  secret_id = var.secret_id
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `secret_id` (String) The secret id to get

### Optional

- `creation_time` (String) Creation time of the secret
- `is_active` (Boolean) Whether this secret is active or not and can be retrieved or modified
- `is_rotatable` (Boolean) Whether this secret can be rotated
- `last_modified` (String) Last time the secret was modified
- `secret` (Attributes) Secret itself (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--secret))
- `secret_details` (Dynamic) Secret extra details
- `secret_name` (String) A friendly name label
- `secret_type` (String) Type of the secret
- `tenant_id` (String) Tenant ID of the secret

<a id="nestedatt--secret"></a>
### Nested Schema for `secret`

Optional:

- `secret_data` (Dynamic) Actual secret data, can be of different types, and is base64 encoded if of SecretBytes, Otherwise Stored in the jit data message as a string Or as a dict of secret data to be encrypted
- `tenant_encrypted` (Boolean) Whether this secret is encrypted by the tenant key or not
